dublin_core.dcvalue: A new wearable sensor platform has been developed It is based on a Field Programmable Gate Array FPGA device Because of this the hardware is very flexible and gives the platform unique opportunities for research of a wide range of architectures applications and signal processing algorithms The platform has been named NWSP for Nokia Wrist Attached Sensor Platform This document describes the hardware the firmware and applications of the platform
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Wearable FPGA based wireless sensor platform.
